page.title: 13Transport in Solihull.
page.content: From a survey we carried out we found that the old and the young are the people who regularly use the{bus {service.}Most people felt that the prices were reasonable and that West Midlands Passenger Executive who run the buses provide a good service,but several people were worried about proposals that the bus service might be privatised and that this would mean less frequent services on the less popular routes. There is one{railway station}in our area called Widney Manor,which has been renovated and all the trains from Leamington Spa now stop here as well as other local trains. The{car}is by far the most popular form of transport.In our class of 28 every family had at least one car and all the class expected to learn to drive as soon as they were seventeen.
